thread.title: Big Mouth Strikes Again in Fareham
thread.title_full: Big Mouth Strikes Again in Fareham

title: Big Mouth Strikes Again in Fareham
text:
0 comments 
WHEN you’ve a mouth this big, is it any wonder you get into trouble, asks Hardeep Singh Kohli when he brings his new show Big Mouth Strikes Again to Fareham ’s Ashcroft Arts Centre next week. 
The comedian, broadcaster, journalist and chef explains all in a brand new show, on the back of its premier at this year’s Edinburgh Festival. Share article 
See him in action on Thursday. 
Tickets: 01329 223100 or visit hampshireculturaltrust.org.uk Promoted Stories Big Mouth Strikes Again in Fareham Sorry, an error occurred.
